name: Urllib
description: A high-level interface for fetching data across the World Wide Web

High-level interface.val: Open a network object denoted by a URL for reading
Copy a network object denoted by a URL to a local file
Clear the cache that may have been built up by previous calls to urlretrieve()

Utility functions.val: Replace special characters in string using the %xx escape
Like quote(), but also replaces spaces by plus signs
Replace %xx escapes by their single-character equivalent
Like unquote(), but also replaces plus signs by spaces
Convert a sequence of two-element tuples to a “percent-encoded” string
Convert the path from local syntax to percent-encoded URL
Convert path from a percent-encoded URL to local syntax for path
Returns a dictionary of scheme to proxy server URL mappings.

URL Opener objects.val: Base class for opening and reading URLs
Provides default handling for the following HTTP response codes: 301, 302, 303, 307 and 401
